name: Drill
description:
Welcome to "Drill" where you play a drill that has to go through various wooden levels.
On your way you will be challenged by wizards, saw blades and flamethrowers.
Also because you are a drill you can shoot drill bits. I mean who can't?

Use everything in your toolbox to complete the levels and kill enemies with boxes.

Controls:
WASD to move
LMB to shoot

Credits:
Coding: Luca Fait, Moritz Lang
Level Design: Moritz Lang, Luca Fait
Graphics: Quinn Bogaerts, Luca Fait
